name: Renewal of license; fees
text: [§453D-11]  Renewal of license; fees.  Licenses shall be renewed, upon the payment of a renewal fee, triennially not earlier than ninety days before June 30, with the first renewal deadline occurring on June 30, 2008.  Failure to renew a license shall result in a forfeiture of the license.  Licenses that have been forfeited may be restored within one year of the expiration date upon payment of renewal and restoration fees.  Failure to restore a forfeited license within one year of the date of its expiration shall result in the automatic termination of the license and the person may be required to reapply for licensure as a new applicant.  All renewal and restoration fees shall be determined by the department. [L 2004, c 209, pt of §2; am L 2008, c 206, §1]
